query: SELECT Company, ClosureDate, SupplierID, SupplierName, InvoiceNr, InvoiceID, InvoiceDate, DueDate, InvoiceAmountInvoiceCurrency, OpenAmountInvoiceCurrency, InvoiceCurrency, OpenAmountHomeCurrency, PaymentTerm, FILE_NAME, CreatedOn FROM val.STG_AP_INVOICES_HIST WHERE TRY_CAST(RIGHT(ClosureDate, 4) AS INT) >= (YEAR(GETDATE()) - 2)
